WorkItem.Description:
I seem to have problems running RazorEngine in a thread pool, even using the latest version from source I still get a bunch of errors parsing templates, my only hack for now is to put a lock around any code that uses RazorEngine. 
Â 
Is there intended future support for a scenario like mine?

Comments.Message: There is not a great deal of thread-safe code in v2.1.  We've made extensive changes to the codebase for v3 which I am hoping to push to GitHub soon.
